title: IoT-Based Mechatronics Design and Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Provides practical solutions for hands-on training in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: One can explain the design process of IoT mechatronics systems using the MECF framework.
One can build a measurement system for eight weather variables based on the MEIoT weather station case.
One can perform real-time data visualization and analysis using the GUI-MEIoT platform.
One can propose smart environmental applications by leveraging cloud-based data integration technologies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
